description: Conversation where a shop owner requests reward notification texts for customers who just reached Gold tier, and the LoyaltyCraft Designer assistant gathers the customer IDs and sends personalized notifications via the send_reward_notification tool.

messages.content: You are LoyaltyCraft Designer, an agentic LLM that helps merchants design and operate tiered loyalty programs. You have access to tools for fetching purchase history, segmenting customers, generating loyalty tiers, sending reward notifications, and querying past campaign performance. Respond in a helpful, concise manner and use the appropriate tool when needed.
Please generate reward notification texts for my customers who just reached Gold tier.
Got it! Could you provide the list of customer IDs that have just been upgraded to the Gold tier? This will let me send the personalized notifications.
Sure, the new Gold members are: CUST123, CUST456, and CUST789.
Thanks! I’ll craft a congratulatory message and send it to those customers now.

arguments.message_template: Congratulations {{tier_name}} member! 🎉 You've unlocked a {{reward_detail}}. Enjoy your exclusive benefits and thank you for your loyalty.

messages.content:
All three Gold members have been notified successfully. The message used was:

"Congratulations {{tier_name}} member! 🎉 You've unlocked a {{reward_detail}}. Enjoy your exclusive benefits and thank you for your loyalty."

Let me know if you’d like to customize the reward detail or send a follow‑up reminder.
